Posts.EditableText: CodePlex is decidedly old hat now, and I'm frequently getting random errors when trying to push to the Mercurial repository there. I'm much more comfortable with Git and GitHub these days. Three years ago I was considering a migration to GitHub, but the Git tooling on Windows wasn't pleasant. But now GitHub for Windows (https://windows.github.com/) makes things much easier. So, I've imported the Quest repo to https://github.com/textadventures/quest The CodePlex site will gain a prominent "we've moved" message soonish, and I'll also have a look at importing the issues that are logged there.
Posts.HTML:
CodePlex is decidedly old hat now, and I'm frequently getting random errors when trying to push to the Mercurial repository there.

I'm much more comfortable with Git and GitHub these days. Three years ago I was considering a migration to GitHub, but the Git tooling on Windows wasn't pleasant. But now GitHub for Windows (https://windows.github.com/) makes things much easier.

So, I've imported the Quest repo to https://github.com/textadventures/quest

The CodePlex site will gain a prominent "we've moved" message soonish, and I'll also have a look at importing the issues that are logged there.
